earwax.menu.menu_item module¶

Provides the MenuItem class.

class earwax.menu.menu_item.MenuItem(title: str, func: Callable[], Optional[Generator[None, None, None]]])¶

Bases: object

An item in a Menu.

This class is rarely used directly, instead add_item() can be used to return an instance.

Variables

  • title – The title of this menu item.

  • func – The function which will be called when this item is activated.

func: Callable[], Optional[Generator[None, None, None]]]¶
on_selected() → None¶

The function which will be called when this menu item is selected.

Could be overridden to play a sound for example.

title: str¶
